item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Plaxico Burress case: Antonio Pierce of New York Giants has no regrets about helping ex-teammate
item.description: Giants linebacker Antonio Pierce says he has no regrets about his actions in helping Plaxico Burress after his former teammate accidentally shot himself in the leg last November.

item.dc:creator: ESPN.com news services
item.title: Cleveland Cavaliers play Boston Celtics, and Los Angeles Lakers get their rings on NBA opening night
item.description: In a replay of last year's opener, the Cleveland Cavaliers and Boston Celtics will launch the 2009-10 NBA season -- only this time LeBron James has some welcome firepower in new teammate Shaquille O'Neal.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: AFL appears to be close to folding and declaring for bankruptcy
item.description: The Arena Football League is on the brink of folding and declaring bankruptcy, an inglorious end for the 22-year-old indoor league that has suffered through a year of turmoil.

item.dc:creator: John Clayton
item.title: Source: Amani Toomer signs with Kansas City Chiefs
item.description: Amani Toomer has signed a deal with Kansas City, according to source.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Albert Haynesworth back at Washington Redskins practice after missing two days
item.description: Washington Redskins defensive tackle Albert Haynesworth is back at practice after missing two straight days with a knee problem.

item.dc:creator: ESPN.com news services
item.title: Jeremy Roenick reportedly will announce retirement Thursday
item.description: San Jose Sharks center Jeremy Roenick will announce his retirement Thursday, according to a report from Comcast SportsNet Bay Area.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Green Bay Packers GM Ted Thompson won't rule out interest in Michael Vick
item.description: Packers general manager Ted Thompson isn't ruling out potential interest in Michael Vick.

item.dc:creator: ESPN.com news services
item.title: Andrew Walter signed, Matt Gutierrez waived by New England Patriots
item.description: The Patriots have signed quarterback Andrew Walter and released quarterback Matt Gutierrez.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Michael Schumacher losing weight, has a little neck pain in prepping for comeback
item.description: Seven-time world champion Michael Schumacher says he is slimming down for his Formula One comeback and the only problem is a little neck pain.

item.dc:creator: Associated Press
item.title: Tour de France stage winner Mikel Astarloza doesn't know reason for positive drug test
item.description: Tour de France stage winner Mikel Astarloza said he doesn't know how he tested positive for the endurance-booster EPO in a sample taken before the start of the race.
